resources.string:
I am James Ramasta, A Third-year IT student from the University of Santo Tomas. I am from San Jose Del Monte Bulacan.

This is a project for ICS26011 Applications Development And Emerging Technologies 3 (Mobile programming). This is the final project for this course using the Android studio application.

I learned so many things. So I want to thank Ms. Perol for teaching us even we are only 9 students you give us the knowledge that will be engrave in our lives.
